V.iii.1.C.1.c
.
Marie-Strumpell Disease
Marie-Strumpell disease, also called rheumatoid spondylitis or ankylosing spondylitis, is
not
the same disease as RA.  RA and Marie-Strumpell disease have separate and distinct clinical manifestations and progress differently.
Reference
:  For more information on evaluating ankylosing spondylitis, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 1.A.3.f
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Arthritis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
